invalid_request: The authorization request sent to the OAuth server by the DE was invalid. Please contact support.
unauthorized_client: The DE is not authorized to request access to the API. Please contact support.
access_denied: The authorization request was denied. Please try again or contact support.
unsupported_response_type: The OAuth server doesn't support the requested response type. Please contact support.
invalid_scope: The OAuth server doesn't support the requested scope. Please contact support.
server_error: The OAuth server encountered an error. Please contact support.
temporarily_unavailable: The OAuth server is temporarily unavailable. Please try again or contact support.
invalid_oauth_config: The DE's OAuth configuration is invalid. Please contact support.
no_auth_code_provided: No authorization code or error code was sent by the OAuth server. Please contact support.
no_state_id_provided: No state information was sent by the OAuth server. Please contact support.
general_service_error: The DE service encountered an error. Please contact support.
